Text: Hello 80z,any chance of putting kip jones song in one of your rare 80s albums please :o)
Catsout, what song? I am a bit drunk so give me a bit more clue! hahaha
well, back home from partying, still a wee bit drunk and again one very nice morning surprise ... thanks, 80z
the song is by experimental products "who is kip jones" ....i know you have it tucked away in your 80s locker somewhere lol
Just when we think that you have disappeared, you post another great set. (Many happy returns and many thanks.)

I missed you. Thanks for coming back to me :) As always I look forwards to checking these out. It's all new to me with the exception of J. Geils Band and even that one I am glad you included as I lost my cassette of it ages ago.
welcome guys. catsout, oh that, sure if i make another mix though. I can e-mail it to you any time.
hello 80z..i have sent an email for my request thanks.
